words.translation: He would certainly have taken away
He will cause you to die
and he got [both of] them out
(will) surely be those who are guided
so that they argue with you
And they were made to drink
And surely you will find them
he could be granted a life

words.translationTr: onlar/suralari kim ortak kosmak ortaklar (with Allah)

words.translation: and those who seclude themselves for devotion and prayer
So will suffice you against them
So We will surely turn you
And surely We will test you
then he should fast in it
then prescribed number (should be made up)

words.translationTr: O halde onlar da karşılık versinler

words.translation: But sin of both of them
surely He (could have) put you in difficulties
And the women who are divorced

words.translationTr: kur' (üç adet veya üç temizlik süresi)
onlar geri donmek -e her biri diger
onlar (would have) fought her biri diger

words.translation: the Sustainer of all that exists
Then he was made to die
